page.title: 16BLURTON METHODIST CHURCH
page.content: On Tuesday afternoon he visited the elderly in Trentham. After that he went to a women's meeting at Normacot. Then he arranged another baptism service, and last of all he arranged a funeral. In the evening he visited a couple in Normacot to talk about marriage. He then had a meeting with the organist and choir members. On Wednesday morning Mr. Dodd studies his bible and prepares his sermon for Sunday. In the afternoon he did three things. First he took communion to the Douglas Macmillan Home, then he visited the sick and elderly in Trentham and Hanford, and then he visited a family who were moving to Ireland. In the evening he had a baptismal visit and went to the property committee meeting. On Thursday morning he visited Blurton High School and made a funeral arrangement.
